content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 28, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 34, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}]

thought: To craft polished_blackstone_pressure_plate, I need to craft 4 polished_blackstone first. To craft polished_blackstone, I need to place 4 blackstone in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move 1 blackstone from slot 30 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 28, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 34, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}]
thought: I have already placed 1 blackstone in slot 1, and now I need to place 1 blackstone to the right of it in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 28, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 34, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}]
thought: I have placed 2 blackstone in slots 1 and 2, and now I need to place 1 blackstone below slot 1 in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 28, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 34, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}]

Ok

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 28, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 34, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}]
thought: Now I can craft the polished_blackstone by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 28, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 56, "index": 22}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 34, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}]

thought: To craft polished_blackstone_pressure_plate, I need to place 2 polished_blackstone side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move 1 polished_blackstone from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
